title: I think it's time Riot acknowledges this considering the amount of traction the post on Reddit has g

embed.description: 642 points and 169 comments so far on reddit

body: Come on, Riot. Let's do something about this already.

replies.body:
Hey Bearded Johnson,

We are aware of this issue and are working to resolve it! In the meantime, you can check out [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gTWoNHAL-what-the-hell-is-this-firewall-error-after-champ-select-why-cant-i-connect-to-the-game) for more information!

Why didn't they respond to thousand of others on Reddit and there is still no public statement? Tell me one fucking reason for that.

Because Reddit isn't their main form of communication????  The Boards is something that they have created for Rioters and Players to communicate.  If you go [here](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na)...they mention they are aware of the firewall issue and are working to fix it.

So, a frontpage posts about skin concepts, patch notes, Graves' cigar, Ahri's tail, and other stuff gets Rioters' attention and they comment on it, but FPS issues, nah! Not our thing. Okay.

And BTW, I'm not talking about firewall issues. If you can stop being biased, you can actually read.

Right.  Because they have so much time on their hands to constantly go to the Boards AND Reddit AND any other form of contact outlet to get through every single thread and respond to every single person wanting information.  Do you not comprehend how much time that would take away from actually fixing the problem?  No.  You would much rather have answers right away than having something fixed sooner.  Keep your panties on and wait!

> So, a frontpage posts about skin concepts, patch notes, Graves' cigar, Ahri's tail, and other stuff gets Rioters' attention and they comment on it, but FPS issues, nah! Not our thing. Okay.

You also clearly don't comprehend that the people responding to these posts are not part of the departments dedicated to fixing these issues.  So shut your fucking face and wait for them to fix it.

Edit:  Sorry.  You annoyed me with your ignorance and calling me biased.  But please understand that there are multiple departments working on different things.  You don't want someone from the art department commenting on something to do with FPS.  They won't know what the hell they are talking about.
